      • setSelfExamTime

        public void setSelfExamTime(int hour,
                            int minute,
                            int second)

        Setting the time in which the POS will run its daily self-exam reboot of PCI 5 specification

        Parameters:
        hour - the hour in which the self-exam reboot is going to run
        minute - the minute of the specified hour (optional)
        second - the second of the specified minute (optional)

      • surpassPermissionsRequest

        public int surpassPermissionsRequest(@NotNull
                                     java.lang.String appPackage)

        Makes the system don't ask for permissions for a given App Package

        Parameters:
        appPackage - application package
        Returns:
        SettingsErrorCode.UNNECESSARY_PERMISSION if method is not needed in this platform, SettingsErrorCode.PERMISSION_GRANTED if permission was set with success or SettingsErrorCode.PERMISSION_DENIED if an error happened during the process

      • addToWhiteList

        public int addToWhiteList(@NotNull
                          java.lang.String appPackage)

        Makes the system avoid battery optimization for a given application package

        Parameters:
        appPackage - application package
        Returns:
        SettingsErrorCode.WHITE_LIST_UNNECESSARY if method is not needed in this platform, SettingsErrorCode.WHITE_LIST_SUCCESS if the app is successfully whitelisted, or SettingsErrorCode.WHITE_LIST_DENIED if an error happened during the process

      • toggleWakeupMode

        public boolean toggleWakeupMode(boolean enable)

        Enable or disable WakeupMode. Wakeup Mode basically wakes up the device in the case of any interaction through power button click, keyboard button click, card swipe or card insertion Some devices don't have all the mentioned interactions (e.g. keyboard button clicks) in that case the other applicable interactions must wake up the device

        Parameters:
        enable - true if WakeupMode should be enabled, false if WakeupMode should be disabled
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful, false otherwise

      • enableWakeupMode

        public boolean enableWakeupMode()

        Enable WakeupMode

        Returns:
        true if operation was successful, false otherwise

        Returns:
        true if operation was successful, false otherwise

      • toggleButtonsLight

        public boolean toggleButtonsLight(boolean enable)

        Enable or disable ButtonsLight. If applicable (if there's any light on the device's buttons) this method controls the state of this light

        Parameters:
        enable - true if the light should be enabled, false if light should be disabled
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful, false otherwise
